subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Sean Kilpatrick hit a 3-pointer with 2.7 seconds left and Cincinnati beat No. 13 Connecticut, 70-67, on Wednesday night for its seventh straight road victory in the Big East.
snippet: Sean Kilpatrick hit a 3-pointer with 2.7 seconds left and Cincinnati beat No. 13 Connecticut, 70-67, on Wednesday night for its seventh straight road victory in the Big East.
